subject: testing void methods
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have just started using junit. I need to know that is there any way by which i can test a void method? The only test cases I have written till now
messageBody:
Hi all,

I have just started using junit. I need to know that is there any way by which i can test a void method? The only test cases I have written till now were for methods that returned some methods and i used to check the value using assertequals(). But how do I do it for a void function.

Somebody, please help me...
